metadata.description: The brutal killing of a young actress during the shooting of a snuff film sets soft core model Juanita Jean Sachs and photographer Ernie Schultz on a quest to discover those responsible. Their journey takes them from the mean streets of New York to the back alleys of New Orleans where they confront the utter depravity and corruption that defines the dark underbelly of American society.
metadata.name: Sachs & Violens
